articles.description: Justin Verlander had some emotional words for his teammates before their champagne...
articles.content: Justin Verlander listened to his manager and spoke for just 30 seconds, but if you give bonus points for salty language, he nailed that impromptu speech, which was captured by SportsTalk 790. You can… [+1380 chars]

articles.author: Mike Vaccaro
articles.title: This is just the start for Max Scherzer as Mets show true playoff ambition - New York Post
articles.description: The Mets have higher ambitions than merely qualifying for the tournament.
articles.content: At the end, there was a sizeable gaggle of Mets fans ringing the lower stands at American Family Field, counting down the final outs. Maybe the players werent prepared to have an all-out celebration … [+4265 chars]
